basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Highly proficient React.js and JavaScript developer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, eager to develop robust user interface components and implement well-known React.js workflows.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend development projects using Vue.js and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality web applications.
highlights: Led frontend refactoring of an exam management platform using Vue.js and Vuetify, improving user experience and page load times
Actively engaged in code reviews and collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate complex mockups into functional web pages

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Core member developing the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript, focusing on UI components.
highlights: Primary front-end developer for architecting and developing key dashboard and form components for campaign management
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility for a seamless user experience
Worked closely with the back-end team on system design and API integration

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application

Built all UI features using a component-based architecture and effectively managed application state using Redux
